messages.content: This General Election is our last chance to stop Brexit. It will decide the future of our country for generations to come.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat majority government will stop Brexit by revoking Article 50. Our united platform aims to ensure community does better than what's offered by both Boris Johnson’s No Deal Brexit and Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Brexit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats came first in every single part of this constituency in the European elections in May 2019 with 36% of the vote.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats are the strongest remain party, aiming to stop Brexit by revoking Article 50.

leaflet.personalStatement: In Ealing Central and Acton, I voted to remain in the EU and I was devastated by the referendum result. Every day, I hear your liberal values and I hate what the chaos and Parliamentary paralysis is doing to our town and our country.
leaflet.additionalNotes: PS The Liberal Democrats won the election here 6 months ago and the Conservatives came fifth. It's between us and Labour now. Vote Liberal Democrats to Stop a Labour Brexit.
